reason: Windows 10 and previous cannot use WebAuthn.
Firefox on Windows 10 MAY use WebAuthn.
Firefox on Windows 11 (13) MAY use WebAuthn.
Firefox on Windows 11 (14) MAY use WebAuthn.
All browsers on Windows 11 (15) support WebAuthn.
Browsers MacOS prior to Monterey (12) do not support WebAuthn using a platform authenticator.
Safari on MacOS Monterey (12) requires user interaction to invoke WebAuthn APIs, which is incompatible with how Beyond Identity uses WebAuthn.
Safari on MacOS Ventura (13) requires a user to enable iCloud Keychain, which cannot, in general, be done with a managed AppleId.
Browsers on iOS devices requires a user to enable iCloud Keychain, which cannot, in general, be done with a managed AppleId.
